attr.title: Battalion
attr.desc:
Your lands have been invaded by General Mustache and his infamous armored division!
Nothing seems to stop him, except perhaps for Commander Joe and his old companion "G-080 Justice" tank destroyer.
Engage in 8 exciting battles through the liberation campaign.
Fight in cities, forests, riverbanks, military bases and more...
Collect the powerup to experience ultimate defense and crush obstacles on the way.
